description: Stores the history of communications. Each column audits a value in CAL_COMM_TRACKING of the same name, unless otherwise specified in the column description.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the communication record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COMM_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category identifier of the communication type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


In Basket


Fax


Mail


Telephone


Pager


Email


Web


Event


Interface


Text Message


Email and Text Message


External Vendor


In Person


In Basket Review


Best Practice Advisory Acknowledgment


Pharmacy


Patient Portal Message


NemSMS


Order placed via recommendation BPA


Print Group Review


Transfer Request Order


No communication enabled


Video


Chat


Payor Communication

columns.name: COMM_PURPOSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category identifier of the communication purpose.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Notification of Decision


Request for Additional Information


Notification of Extension


Request to Expedite


Request for Authorization


Receipt of Additional Information


Denial of Request to Expedite


P2P Review Offer


P2P Review Completed


Notification of Approval


Notification of Denial

columns.name: LOGIN_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the user's login department. This corresponds to CAL_COMM_TRACKING.CONTACT_LOGIN_DEPARTMENT_ID.

columns.name: COMM_INSTANT_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant of the communication in local time.

columns.name: COMM_END_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant in UTC the communication ended.

columns.name: COMM_COMMENT
columns.description: Stores the comment on the communication.

columns.name: COMM_CMT_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the associated note.

columns.name: CALLER_NAME
columns.description: Stores the caller's name.

columns.name: PHONE_NUMBER
columns.description: Stores the phone number used for the communication.

columns.name: PHONE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category identifier of the type of phone communication.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Mobile


Pager


Home Fax


Other Fax


Assistant


TTY


Home Phone


Work Phone


Video Phone

columns.name: CALL_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category identifier of the call type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Incoming


Outgoing

columns.name: CALL_OUTCOME_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category identifier of the outcome.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


No Answer/Busy


Left Message


Not Available


Canceled


Reminder rule failed


Duplicate reminder


Delivery type mismatch


No email address on file


Missing or Invalid Number


Incomplete setup to send messages


Patient updates disabled


Duplicate update


Patient not accepting updates


Patient is not signed up for updates


Phone not allowed


Sent to Communication Vendor


Patient received a text message, but not an email


Patient received an email, but not a text message

columns.name: LAB_CALL_TOPIC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category identifier of the lab call topic.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other


Critical Result


Missing Items

columns.name: COMM_CONTACT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category identifier of the type of record being contacted.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient


Provider


Employer Group


Carrier


Guarantor Account


Network


Vendor


Payer


Premium Billing Account


Employee


Pool


Ad Hoc


Pharmacy


Worker


Department


Prospective Patient


Submitter


Authorized Representative


Responsible Party


Facility

columns.name: CONTACT_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the provider being contacted.

columns.name: CONTACT_PLAN_GRP_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the employer group being contacted. This corresponds to CAL_COMM_TRACKING.CONTACT_EMPGROUP_ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_PLAN_GRP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer group record

columns.name: CONTACT_CARRIER_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the carrier being contacted.

columns.name: CONTACT_CARRIER_ID_CARRIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the carrier record.

columns.name: CONTACT_ACCT_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the guarantor being contacted.

columns.name: CONTACT_NETWORK_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the network being contacted.

columns.name: CONTACT_NETWORK_ID_NETWORK_NAME
columns.description: The name of the network.

columns.name: CONTACT_VENDOR_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the vendor being contacted.

columns.name: CONTACT_VENDOR_ID_VENDOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the vendor.

columns.name: CONTACT_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the payer being contacted.

columns.name: CONTACT_PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: CONTACT_PB_ACCT_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the premium billing account being contacted. This corresponds to CAL_COMM_TRACKING.CONTACT_PBA_ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_REGISTRY_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the pool being contacted. This corresponds to CAL_COMM_TRACKING.CONTACT_HIP_ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_REGISTRY_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the In Basket registry in the HIP master file.

columns.name: CONTACT_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the user being contacted.

columns.name: CONTACT_ADHOC_NAME
columns.description: Stores the name of an ad hoc contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_ADHOC_FAX
columns.description: Stores the fax number of an ad hoc contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_ADHOC_PHONE
columns.description: Stores the phone number of an ad hoc contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_ADHOC_ADDR
columns.description: Stores the address of an ad hoc contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_ADHOC_CITY
columns.description: Stores the city of an ad hoc contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_ADHOC_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category identifier of the state of an ad hoc contact. This corresponds to CAL_COMM_TRACKING.CONTACT_ADHOC_STT_C.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CONTACT_ADHOC_ZIP
columns.description: Stores the zip code of an ad hoc contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_ADHOC_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category identifier of the country of an ad hoc contact. This corresponds to CAL_COMM_TRACKING.CONTACT_ADHOC_CTR_C and can be translated using ZC_COUNTRY_2.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CONTACT_PHARMACY_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the pharmacy being contacted. This corresponds to CAL_COMM_TRACKING.CONTACT_PHR_ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_WORKER_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the worker being contacted.

columns.name: CONTACT_WORKER_PAGER_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category identifier of the worker pager being contacted. This can be translated using ZC_DEFAULT_PAGER.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CONTACT_PROSPECT_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the prospective party being contacted.

columns.name: CONTACT_SUBMITTER_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the submitter being contacted.

columns.name: CONTACT_SUBMITTER_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the submitter record.

columns.name: CHANGE_USER_ID
columns.description: The history change user is the user who triggered the update to record this history line. This means that the user who recorded this line changed the state of the record from the values on this line and set the values on the following line or the current state of the record if this is the last line in the history. This differs from I CAL 8010 which tracks the entry user who is normally the user who made the actual communication.
